nodes.text: Malkii was a location where the musician Tu-Wane Jipps was involved in some nasty business that caused him to owe a huge favor to the criminal Tobias Beckett at some point prior to Beckett's death in 10 BBY.

In the new Star Wars canon, Malkii was mentioned in the comic story "Tales of Villainy: Credits", which was written by Jordan Clark and published in Star Wars Adventures 4 on March 24, 2021. The location originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1984 reference book A Guide to the Star Wars Universe by Raymond L. Velasco.
